blogs.title: Tailwind CSS v4: What’s New and Why It Matters
blogs.author: Sanjay Sharma

blogs.content: Tailwind v4 removes the need for heavy config files and introduces @theme variables, making styling more intuitive and faster.

blogs.title: Understanding useEffect in React
blogs.author: Priya Koirala
blogs.description: useEffect is one of the most confusing hooks for beginners. This post explains it with simple examples.
blogs.content: The useEffect hook allows you to perform side effects in function components. Common use cases include data fetching and event listeners.
